section: Section 1: History and Development of Physical Education and Sport
objective: Understand the evolution of physical education and sports.
content: Origins of modern sports, the Olympic movement, and the development of PE in the Caribbean.
specific_objectives: Trace the history of the Ancient and Modern Olympic Games
Discuss the evolution of PE in Caribbean schools
Identify the roles of international sporting bodies (IOC, FIFA, etc.)
Analyze the social and economic impact of major sporting events

objective: Understand the physiological basis of physical activity.
content: Skeletal, muscular, circulatory, and respiratory systems. Focuses on the impact of exercise.
specific_objectives: Identify major bones and muscles of the human body
Describe the functions of the circulatory and respiratory systems during exercise
Explain the concept of 'Aerobic' versus 'Anaerobic' respiration
Analyze the immediate and long-term effects of exercise on the body
Discuss the importance of nutrition and hydration for athletes

objective: Apply scientific principles to improve physical fitness.
content: Components of fitness, principles of training (FITT), and types of training (circuit, interval, etc.).
specific_objectives: Distinguish between health-related and skill-related components of fitness
Apply the FITT principle: Frequency, Intensity, Time, Type
Describe various training methods: Circuit, Continuous, Fartlek, Interval
Explain the importance of warm-up and cool-down routines
Discuss methods of measuring and evaluating fitness

section: Section 4: Health, Safety and First Aid
objective: Maintain a safe environment and manage injuries.
content: Sports injuries (sprains, strains, fractures), first aid procedures (RICE), and safety equipment.
specific_objectives: Identify common sports injuries and their causes
Demonstrate the RICE treatment method (Rest, Ice, Compression, Elevation)
Discuss safety precautions in various sporting environments
Explain the importance of appropriate sports gear and equipment

objective: Analyze the psychological and social dimensions of sport.
content: Motivation, teamwork, leadership, and the role of sport in society.
specific_objectives: Discuss factors that influence participation in sport
Explain the role of motivation and goal setting in performance
Analyze the impact of media and sponsorship on sports
Discuss ethical issues in sport: doping, fair play, and gamesmanship
